settings.title: Settings

connections.title: Connections
connections.description: Manage LLM service connections. Register multiple connections and use models from each.

validation.url: Base URL must start with http:// or https://

customHeaders.title: Custom HTTP Headers (Model Specific)
customHeaders.description: Inherits headers from Connection by default. Adding a header with the same name overrides it for this model.

validation.connectionNotFound: The connection referenced by the model does not exist. Please check the Connections tab.

proxy.title: Proxy Settings
proxy.description: Manage proxy and SSL certificate verification settings. These settings apply to all external connections including LLM, ComfyUI, VectorDB, MCP, etc.

ssl.title: SSL Settings
ssl.verifyDescription: Validate SSL certificates. Disable if using self-signed certificates.

validation.needBaseUrlAndApiKey: Please enter Base URL and API Key first.

nanobanana.connectionDescription: Manage image generation settings using Google Imagen API.

nanobanana.vertexAiDescription: Use Google Cloud Vertex AI directly. OAuth 2 access token is required.

nanobanana.modelDescription: Fast: Fast generation, Standard: Higher quality

questions.title: Quick Questions (Max 5)
questions.description: Instantly ask questions and get answers based on clipboard content.
questions.descriptionPrompt: ‚Ä¢ Prompt: Sent as LLM system message to define role/instructions.
questions.descriptionClipboard: ‚Ä¢ Clipboard Content: Sent as user message to be processed.
questions.descriptionExample: e.g., Prompt "Korean to English, English to Korean" ‚Üí Translates clipboard text.
questions.name: Name
questions.promptPlaceholder: e.g., Korean to English, English to Korean
questions.promptDescription: System message that defines the role or instructions for the LLM.
questions.promptDescriptionClipboard: Clipboard content is sent as a separate user message to be processed.

snapshotsPath.description: Location where snapshot files saved by page capture are stored.

llm.resetConfirm: Reset Browser Agent LLM settings to default?
llm.resetSuccess: Browser Agent LLM settings have been reset.
llm.saveSuccess: Browser Agent LLM settings have been saved.
llm.temperature: Creativity Control (0-2, default: 0.7, lower is more consistent)

font.title: Browser Chat Font Settings
font.familyDescription: Select the font to use for chat messages.
font.sizeDescription: Font size for chat messages (10-24px, default: 14px)
font.previewAi: AI: Hello! How can I help you?

teamDocs.title: Team Docs
teamDocs.tokenRequired: Please enter GitHub Personal Access Token.
teamDocs.tokenDescription: üí° Token is stored locally only and is not synced to GitHub. repo permission is required.
teamDocs.docsPathDescription: Folder path to fetch documents from GitHub repository (default: sepilot/documents)
teamDocs.noConfigsHint: Add new Team Docs to sync team documents.
teamDocs.usage1: You can fetch team documents from multiple GitHub repositories
teamDocs.usage2: Each Team Docs is managed independently and stored in VectorDB
teamDocs.usage3: Can be used for RAG search separately from Personal Docs
teamDocs.usage4: Sync latest documents anytime with Pull button

githubSync.connectionDescription: Connect to repository using GitHub Personal Access Token.
githubSync.ghesUrlDescription: Enter the base URL of GHES instance (e.g., https://github.company.com)
githubSync.tokenDescription: Personal Access Token with repo permission is required.
githubSync.errorReportingDescription: Automatically report errors to GitHub Issue to help improve the program.
githubSync.errorReportingDetails:
Automatically creates GitHub Issue when errors occur and sends to development team.
Error messages, stack traces, and system information are included, but no personal information is included.
githubSync.errorReportingInfo1: Error messages and stack traces are sent to GitHub Issue.
githubSync.errorReportingInfo2: Basic system information such as app version and OS platform is included.
githubSync.errorReportingInfo3: Sensitive information such as API keys and tokens are never sent.
githubSync.errorReportingInfo4: This information is very important for program improvement.
githubSync.errorReportingInfo5: This feature is only available when GitHub Token is set.
githubSync.securityInfo1: Sensitive information (LLM API keys, etc.) is encrypted with AES-256-GCM.
githubSync.securityInfo2: GitHub Token is stored locally only and is not synced.
githubSync.securityInfo3: Synced files are stored in sepilot/ folder.
githubSync.securityInfo4: Please be careful about privacy when syncing conversations and images.

settings.title: Settings Sync
settings.description: Application settings such as LLM, Network, VectorDB

backup.title: Backup/Restore
backup.exportDescription: Export all conversations and messages to XML file.
backup.importDescription: Restore conversations from XML backup file.
backup.warning1: Import adds to existing conversations (does not overwrite)
backup.warning2: Duplicate IDs will be updated with latest data
backup.warning3: Page will automatically refresh after import

beta.title: Beta
beta.warning: Beta features are still in development and incomplete. They may have many bugs, so use in production is not recommended.

presentationMode.title: Enable Presentation Mode
presentationMode.description: When Presentation mode is enabled, the "Presentation" item will appear in Chat, Editor, and Browser sidebars.
presentationMode.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è This feature is currently under development and incomplete.

jsonEditor.description: Edit settings.json - Manage all settings in the same way as VSCode.

steps.statusDescription: Follow the steps to configure GitHub synchronization.

config.title: 1. Basic Configuration
config.description: Configure GitHub Server Type and App ID.
config.ghesUrlDescription: Enter the full URL of your GitHub Enterprise Server
config.appIdDescription: App ID found in the GitHub App settings page
config.privateKeyDescription: Upload the Private Key file (.pem) of the GitHub App

install.title: 2. Install GitHub App
install.description: Install the GitHub App in your browser.

guide.title: Installation Guide
guide.step1: Click the button below to open the GitHub App installation page.
guide.step2: Select the repository to install (All repositories or specific repository).
guide.step4: Check the Installation ID in the URL after installation (e.g., /settings/installations/12345678).

verify.title: 3. Verify Installation
verify.description: Enter the Installation ID and verify the connection.
verify.installationIdDescription: Installation ID obtained after installing GitHub App (numbers only)

repository.title: 4. Select Sync Repository
repository.description: Select the repository to sync settings and data.
repository.label: Repository
repository.noSelection: Select a repository to store encrypted settings.

complete.title: 5. Setup Complete!
complete.description: GitHub synchronization has been successfully configured.

security.title: üîí Security Info
security.description: All sensitive information (tokens, API keys, Private Keys, etc.) is encrypted with AES-256-GCM and synced to the selected GitHub repository. Proxy and SSL verification settings configured in the Network tab also apply to GitHub communication.

messages.privateKeySaved: Private Key has been securely saved.
messages.installPageOpened: Please install GitHub App in the browser. Enter Installation ID after installation.
messages.installPageFailed: Failed to open GitHub App installation page.
messages.testSuccess: Connection test successful! Can access the repository.

githubSync.title: GitHub Connection Settings
githubSync.description: Connect to repository using GitHub Personal Access Token.

githubSync.tokenDescription: Personal Access Token with 'repo' scope is required.

errorReporting.title: Automatic Error Reporting
errorReporting.description: Automatically report errors to GitHub Issues to help improve the program.
errorReporting.enableDescription:
Automatically create GitHub Issues when errors occur.
Includes error messages, stack traces, and system info. No personal data included.
errorReporting.info1: Error messages and stack traces are sent to GitHub Issues.
errorReporting.info2: Basic system info (App version, OS) is included.
errorReporting.info3: Sensitive info (API keys, Tokens) is NEVER sent.
errorReporting.info4: This information is vital for program improvement.
errorReporting.info5: This feature is only available when GitHub Token is set.

security.title: üîí Security Info
security.item1: Sensitive info (LLM keys, etc.) is encrypted with AES-256-GCM.
security.item2: GitHub Token is stored locally and NOT synced.
security.item3: Synced files are stored in 'sepilot/' folder.
security.item4: Please be mindful of privacy when syncing conversations/images.

documentDialog.systemPrompt: You are a professional AI assistant specialized in document editing and improvement.

prompts.refine:
Refine the following text to extract only the core content and remove unnecessary content. Write it cleanly in markdown format:

{{text}}
prompts.translateKo:
Translate the following text naturally into Korean:

{{text}}
prompts.translateEn:
Translate the following text naturally into English:

{{text}}
prompts.translateJa:
Translate the following text naturally into Japanese:

{{text}}
prompts.expand:
Expand the content of the following text in more detail and richness. Include additional explanations and examples:

{{text}}
prompts.shorten:
Summarize the following text concisely, leaving only the core content:

{{text}}
prompts.improve:
Improve the readability and quality of the following text. Improve grammar, expression, structure and write more clearly:

{{text}}
prompts.verify:
Verify the content of the following text and analyze if there are any factual errors or logical contradictions. If there are problems, point them out, and if not, reply with "Verification complete: No issues":

{{text}}

documentDialog.teamDocsIdMissing: Team Docs ID is missing. This document is not a Team Docs sync target.
documentDialog.documentConflict: Document conflict detected! There are changes from another user on GitHub. Please sync (Pull) first.
documentDialog.repoPathRequired: Please enter Repository URL and path.
documentDialog.personalDocsDesc: Personal Documents: Documents for personal use only.
documentDialog.teamDocsDesc: Team Docs: Documents shared by the entire team.
documentDialog.selectTeamDocsRepo: Select the Team Docs Repository this document belongs to.
documentDialog.noTeamDocsConfigured: No Team Docs configured. Please set up Team Docs Repository first.
documentDialog.httpUrlDescription: Fetch text document via HTTP(S) URL.
documentDialog.cleanWithLLMDescription: Remove HTML tags, ads, unnecessary text and extract core content only
documentDialog.githubPathDescription: File path or directory path (if directory, fetches all .md, .txt files)
documentDialog.cleanWithLLMDescription2: Remove unnecessary code/comments outside markdown, extract core document content only
documentDialog.chunkSentenceDesc: Chunks by sentence to preserve context. Recommended for most cases.
documentDialog.chunkStructureDesc: Preserves structure like Markdown headings, code blocks. Suitable for technical documents.
documentDialog.chunkCharacterDesc: Simply splits by character count. Fast but context may be lost.
documentDialog.chunkTokenDesc: Chunks by LLM token units. (Currently falls back to sentence method)
documentDialog.title: Title
documentDialog.uploadDescription: Add a new document to use in RAG search.
documentDialog.aiActionHint: Select text and right-click to execute AI actions (right-click without selection applies to entire document)
documentDialog.noTeamDocsId: No Team Docs ID. Cannot push to GitHub.
documentDialog.notTeamDocs: This document is not from Team Docs.
